title: A California Wildfire Has Thrown a Wrench Into PG&E’s Bankruptcy Process
text:
Things just keep getting more complicated in the bankruptcy of PG&E Corp. The stock had lost nearly one-quarter of its value on Friday afternoon—a decline that may be too steep given the potential benefits of a new California law.

A wildfire in northern California is threatening to throw a wrench into court proceedings for the holding company and its subsidiary, Pacific Gas and Electric, that began in January. The company filed for bankruptcy protection as it faced claims of up to $30 billion from a series of catastrophic...
description: PG&E stock had lost nearly one-quarter of its value on Friday afternoon—a decline that may be too steep given the potential benefits of a new California law.
